change.changenote: Section 5 (d) BEFORE amended by 2003-70-127, effective March 29, 2004 (BC Reg 64/2004).

paragraph.paragraphtext: that a corporation has surrendered or forfeited its rights, privileges or franchises, and that it be dissolved and wound up or that it be restrained from contravening or offending its Act of incorporation, or an Act under which it has been incorporated, or an Act or law in force in British Columbia;

change.changenote: Section 7 BEFORE amended by 2010-6-97,Sch 7, effective July 1, 2010.

section.sectiontext: The Rules of Court, except so far as they otherwise provide, apply to and regulate all proceedings under this Act.
